text:
Although the incident was resolved,
the scars of the damage still remained
at the ceremony hall of Archimedes Colony.

Rapid restoration work was being carried out,
primarily by the heroes themselves,
and the solemn atmosphere was gradually being restored.

Having finished the day's work and disbanded,
[Player] was called over by a certain person.

options.text: I probably can't go too far.
Somewhere to kill time, let's see...

text:
The boulevard, full of smiles and vitality.
[Player] looked around again. Then, there was—

name: Yotaro
text:
...Eh, wait.
[Player], what are you doing here!?

options.text: I thought you had already left the moon!?

text:
Hearing [Player]'s words,
Yotaro looked away awkwardly.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Um, well...
I was planning to return after doing
some shopping and gathering information, so...

name: Yotaro
text:
...By the way,
aren't you with the heroes today?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: I see, considering the recent incident, I can't help but feel it's a bit careless...

options.text: I was with them until a moment ago.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: I see, considering the recent incident, I can't help but feel it's a bit careless...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: I told Gaisei-kun not to get into a fight with anyone, and currently he's on standby in a different location.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even for minor errands, if we act together, it often results in a battle, so...

name: Yotaro
text:
Well, that's fine in its own way.
...[Player], if you don't mind,
would you give me a bit of your time?

name: Yotaro
text:
I had wanted to talk with you a bit more.
...It got quite chaotic the other day, after all.

name: Yotaro
text:
Do you know a place where we can sit and talk?
If not, I'll just look for one.

options.text: ...Oh, in that case, I know a good place!
It's a shop a colleague told me about.

text:
Led by [Player],
Yotaro stepped into a certain cafe.

name: Yotaro
text:
...W-Wait a minute. [Player], this shop...
Isn't it a high-class establishment?

name: Yotaro
text:
The menu looks quite expensive too—
...Eek.

He glanced at the menu, and at the prices,
Yotaro let out a small shriek.

options.text: I'm the one paying, so don't worry about it.
I-It's more than I expected, but it's fine either way...

text:
When [Player] indicated their intention to pay,
Yotaro lowered his gaze awkwardly.

name: Yotaro
text:
...S-Sorry.
The repair costs from the other day just
wiped out a large sum of money again.

name: Yotaro
text:
Sorry, I'm the one who invited you,
but today I'm taking you up on your offer instead...

Yotaro reached for a fork,
looking at the cake and tea set that was brought.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Delicious.
The taste really takes you back.
[Player], please have some too.

Yotaro placed a bite-sized piece of cake
on his fork and offered it to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, s-sorry.
I wasn't thinking at all...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: It was an expensive cake, so I thought it would be wrong for me to eat it alone...!
Yotaro offered the entire plate of cake and gazed at [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
...I had always wanted to
meet and talk to you.

name: Yotaro
text:
I wondered what kind of person you were,
that Gaisei-kun would be so obsessed.

name: Yotaro
text:
So, I intended to observe you during this ceremony.
It's like they say, 'seeing is believing'.

name: Yotaro
text:
But, after seeing you directly and fighting alongside you,
I had no choice but to be convinced.

name: Yotaro
text:
...You're not just strong.
You have a mysterious scent that attracts people.

options.text: You observe with taste and smell, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
Um... well.
It's like knowing the taste of
something just by looking at it, I suppose.

name: Yotaro
text:
For example, when you see a cake,
you instinctively think it's sweet,
or if it's a lemon, it's sour, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
I think it's close to that.
I can tell who someone is, or what state
they're in, by their taste and smell.

name: Yotaro
text:
...What kind of taste and from where,
that is a bit too embarrassing to say...

options.text: That's a sense I don't understand...

name: Yotaro
text:
It's fine if you don't understand.
After all, I can't understand your senses either, [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
I shared it a little during the battle,
but it was a strange feeling.

Having said that much,
Yotaro let out a small sigh.

name: Yotaro
text:
...As I said before,
I don't dislike you.

name: Yotaro
text:
As fellow "Observers",
I think there are things
we can understand about each other.

name: Yotaro
text:
However...
I do think you're a bit unfair.
You're too blessed with luck.

Yotaro took another bite of cake,
a little sulkily.

name: Yotaro
text:
...So, if you had been a bad person,
I thought I'd antagonize you, before even meeting you.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yet... You were the kind of person,
who would choose to fight alongside
both me and Gaisei-kun.

name: Yotaro
text:
You treat others without discrimination,
and you even accept to cooperate
on operating with me...

Yotaro looked up and
gazed directly at [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
...If I had met you a little earlier,
I wonder if I could have chosen a
different path as an "Observer".

name: Yotaro
text:
—Such a fantasy, now that I'm thinking about it,
perhaps that's just how much I'm interested in you.

Yotaro put down his fork.
His plate was empty.

name: Yotaro
text:
—Ah, that's right, [Player].
Please lend me your hand.

Yotaro took out his bag and
placed his hand over [Player]'s hand.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Since I'm a villain,
I can't leave you any information.

name: Yotaro
text:
However, I will definitely
repay you for the cake today.
I don't like being in debt myself.

name: Yotaro
text:
I want to be your equal.
...Until then, please hold onto this.

name: Yotaro
text:
It's my favorite,
so please don't lose it.

He opened his hand,
and there was a small puppy keychain.

name: Yotaro
text:
Today, we met by chance again,
and just for a little while...
I'm happy enough to feel that way—

name: Yotaro
text:
The more I think of you,
the more I think I like you.

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player], the cake was delicious.
Next time, it's my turn to treat you.

From the cafe window,
looking down at Earth floating in the sky,
the two quietly laughed to each other.
